The goal of **paisaje** is to provide tools for spatial and landscape analysis in R.  It includes functions for working with landscape metrics, spatial data manipulation, and biodiversity conservation applications.

## Installation

You can install the development version of paisaje from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ManuelSpinola/paisaje")
```
